item.title: PFE
item.description: score:953 Chances: BioNTech, Pfizer’s partner, is still on track with its ‘variant-adapted Covid-19 vaccine’ despite a drop in sales during the second quarter. Pfizer’s CEO is focusing on new drug approvals and deals to drive growth after the pandemic-related boost from Covid-19 vaccine and drug sales.
